name: James Stavridis
summary: Former Supreme Allied Commander of NATO who called Trump's use of military force against protesters 'beyond the pale of American norms.'

keyStatements.quote: Beyond the pale of American norms
keyStatements.context: Criticizing Trump's use of National Guard against Black Lives Matter protesters

awards: Vice Admiral James Bond Stockdale Award
